name: Life OS Workshop
description: If the Life OS Workshop has sold out, join the waiting list for the next one here: Life OS Workshop Waiting listImagine…An extra 10h/week and no more overwhelm or frustration.Every time you open Notion you know exactly where everything is, you have clarity on what needs to get done, and you have the knowledge and skills required to build your own life-management systems and integrate them into your Life OS dashboard.But…In reality you blankly stare at your screen next to your pile of notes you d
